tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE patients (
    patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    contact_number VARCHAR(15),
    wearable_device_id INT,
    heart_rate INT,
    body_temperature FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE Patients (
    patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_name VARCHAR(255),
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(50),
    device_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE HealthData (
    health_data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT,
    heart_rate INT,
    blood_pressure VARCHAR(10),
    temperature DECIMAL(5,2),
    FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES Patients(patient_id)
);

CREATE TABLE patient_health_data (
    patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    heart_rate INT,
    blood_pressure VARCHAR,
    temperature FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE doctor_profiles (
    doctor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    doctor_name VARCHAR,
    specialization VARCHAR,
    location VARCHAR,
    contact_number VARCHAR
)

CREATE TABLE monitoring_devices (
    device_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_type VARCHAR,
    manufacturer VARCHAR,
    firmware_version VARCHAR
)

CREATE TABLE patients (
  patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_name VARCHAR(50),
  age INT,
  gender CHAR(1),
  email VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE wearables (
  wearable_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  wearable_name VARCHAR(50),
  patient_id INT,
  last_update TIMESTAMP,
  health_data JSON
)

CREATE TABLE doctors (
  doctor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  doctor_name VARCHAR(50),
  specialty VARCHAR(50),
  experience_years INT
)

CREATE TABLE monitoring_logs (
  log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  doctor_id INT,
  log_time TIMESTAMP,
  log_details TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE patients (
    patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    age INT,
    gender CHAR(1),
    contact_number VARCHAR(15)
);

CREATE TABLE wearable_devices (
    device_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    device_type VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
    patient_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES patients(patient_id)
);

CREATE TABLE health_data (
    data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_id INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    heart_rate INT,
    steps_count INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (device_id) REFERENCES wearable_devices(device_id)
);

CREATE TABLE monitoring_session (
    session_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT,
    staff_id INT,
    start_time TIMESTAMP,
    end_time TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES patients(patient_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (staff_id) REFERENCES medical_staff(staff_id)
);
